user_prompt: I am looking for companies who are hiring account executives and sales related positions and who also had bad reviews recently on websites like G2, Gartner and Trustradius

analysis_results.analysis_task:
{
  "Query1": "\"Hiring Account Executive\" AND \"job opening\" AND (\"G2 negative\" OR \"poor G2 review\")",
  "Query2": "\"Sales position hiring\" AND \"apply now\" AND (\"Gartner low score\" OR \"Gartner criticism\")",
  "Query3": "\"Account Executive careers\" AND \"urgent hiring\" AND (\"TrustRadius negative\" OR \"low TrustRadius rating\")",
  "Query4": "\"Sales recruitment\" AND \"we're hiring\" AND (\"bad reviews\" AND (\"G2\" OR \"Gartner\" OR \"TrustRadius\"))",
  "Query5": "\"Now hiring sales team\" AND \"account executive\" AND (\"customer complaints\" OR \"dissatisfied users\")",
  "Query6": "\"Company hiring\" AND \"sales representative\" AND (\"Gartner poor feedback\" OR \"TrustRadius low satisfaction\")",
  "Query7": "\"Immediate openings\" AND \"sales role\" AND (\"G2 feedback issues\" OR \"negative G2 review\")",
  "Query8": "\"Careers\" AND \"sales department\" AND (\"recent negative reviews\" AND (\"Gartner\" OR \"TrustRadius\"))",
  "Query9": "\"Job posting\" AND \"account executive\" AND (\"user dissatisfaction\" OR \"poor review\" AND \"G2\")",
  "Query10": "\"Sales job openings\" AND \"apply today\" AND (\"negative customer review\" AND (\"TrustRadius\" OR \"Gartner\"))"
}

results.signal_description: This review highlights significant dissatisfaction among employees in the sales division at Gartner, indicating potential issues for candidates considering sales roles.
This job posting indicates a focus on resolving customer complaints, which is relevant for candidates looking for sales roles that require strong customer service skills.
This position emphasizes acquiring new customers and expanding relationships, highlighting the importance of customer satisfaction in sales roles.
This position requires resolving customer complaints, indicating the importance of customer feedback in the sales process.
